scripts.network: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && concurrently-repeat "npm run start:agent:multi"
scripts.start:foo: cross-env APP_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run start:ui:foo"
scripts.start: npm run build:happ && npm run start:agent
scripts.start:playground: npm run build:happ && npm run start:agent:playground
scripts.start:agent: cross-env UI_PORT=5000 APP_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run start:happ" "npm run start:ui:watch"
scripts.start:agent:playground: cross-env UI_PORT=5000 APP_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run playground" "npm run start:happ" "npm run start:ui:watch"
scripts.start:agent:multi: cross-env UI_PORT=$(port) APP_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run start:happ" "npm run start:ui:watch"
scripts.start:ui: npm run build:ui && npm run dev -w talking-stickies-app
scripts.start:ui:watch: npm run build:ui && npm run dev:watch -w talking-stickies-app
scripts.start:happ: echo "starting hc instance: $APP_PORT" && RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc s -f=$ADMIN_PORT --piped generate ./apps/launcher/workdir/talking-stickies.happ --run=$APP_PORT -a talking-stickies$APP_PORT network mdns
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dna && hc app pack ./apps/launcher/workdir
scripts.build:dna: npm run build:zome && hc dna pack ./apps/launcher/dnas/talking-stickies
scripts.package:applet: npm run build:ui && npm run package -w we-applet
scripts.package:launcher: npm run build:happ && npm run build:ui && npm run package -w talking-stickies-app && hc web-app pack ./apps/launcher/workdir
